show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Exercise and Affordable Care
content:
Prescriptions for Health, 8/20/12: · What Practice Reduces Loneliness, Stress and Inflammation · What Common Drugs… Cause Cancer?
· Is Lack of Exercise a Disease?
· Should MD’s be Paid on the Basis of Performance?
· What Will the Affordable Care Act do to Quality of Care, Cost and MD Availability?
